channel.title: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers
channel.description:
Since we're excelling in our server and client, we're literally running out of ideas to put in. We want as much content as possible. Please post your application below and we can further talk if I accept you as a pending member.
[code]Name: Age: Experience: Creativity on a scale of 1 - 10: Post a creative idea off the top of your head:[/code]

item.title: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Like me to apply?

Read full topic
item.source: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers

item.title: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:15, topic:479781”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=598017.msg4209218#msg4209218 date=1359315714]

Post a creative idea off the top of your head: When someone first login they get to see a Cut-Scene about the server, so basically the storyline of the server. Not many servers have story lines and it would be unique if your server has :D.

I just want to point out, cut scenes are really hard afaik.
[/quote]
I never did a cut scene but isnt it just a camera rotations and a npc dialogue?[/quote]Cutscenes take a lot of planning, perfectly timed events, manipulating the right packets (which is the bitch), and all the other shit like npcs walking to a certain coordinate.

Read full topic

item.title: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Same concept, yet it doesn’t absorb the hit, it takes and gives back. (unless I am wrong that a divine heals you)

Also, this method of training farming can be abused very well.
That's when you need to use a sort of moderation to prevent people from achieving this item constantly. Maybe it is a reward from a minigame that costs the most points; maybe it is a rare boss drop; maybe it is a player-of-the-week award. Definitely not for donation purposes, otherwise the rich players would have 99 farming in not a lot of time.

Read full topic
item.source: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers

item.title: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:9, topic:479781”]I wasn’t sure what you wanted me to elaborate more on, so I just jacked up the application, my own way.

[]Name: Flame_ / John
[]Skype: I will PM if you want me
[]Experience: I am guessing you mean development teams? Well, I'm on the Froyo team right now. I have no other groups listed because I am still relatively new here.
[]Age: 16
[]Past Creative Posts: Still a work in progress, but look here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,597979.msg4208928.html#msg4208928
[]How Well Do You Work on a Team: I can liven things up here and there, and I've got the corniest jokes you can find. In terms of leadership, I'm not going to undermine anyone's authority that is above me. If I am asked to think up of something, it's definitely not going to be a Vicious Revolution Godsword that you have to donate for. ;)

Now, about that watermelon hat, because I think that was what you wanted me to elaborate on, now that I think of it.
Basically, it’s a chinstrap attached to a bulbous watermelon. You wear it on your head. Now, say you go into battle, and the watermelon is being worn. Say you have 100 hitpoints (just for the sake of simplicity), and you are damaged 85 hitpoints. The power of the watermelon goes ahead and heals 20% of what was just dealt to you, which would be ~17-18 hitpoints. This item can use its affects on you three times before it disintegrates, and plants a watermelon seed plot right underneath where you are standing. This plot acts as farming experience for you, and can is used the same way as you would use any other farming plot.[/quote]

So it’s a more elementary version of the Divine Spirit Shield? Also, this method of training farming can be abused very well.

Read full topic
item.source: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers

item.title: Vicious Revolution - Looking for a team of Creative thinkers
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I wasn’t sure what you wanted me to elaborate more on, so I just jacked up the application, my own way.

[]Name: Flame_ / John
[]Skype: I will PM if you want me
[]Experience: I am guessing you mean development teams? Well, I'm on the Froyo team right now. I have no other groups listed because I am still relatively new here.
[]Age: 16
[]Past Creative Posts: Still a work in progress, but look here - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,597979.msg4208928.html#msg4208928
[]How Well Do You Work on a Team: I can liven things up here and there, and I've got the corniest jokes you can find. In terms of leadership, I'm not going to undermine anyone's authority that is above me. If I am asked to think up of something, it's definitely not going to be a Vicious Revolution Godsword that you have to donate for. ;)

Now, about that watermelon hat, because I think that was what you wanted me to elaborate on, now that I think of it.
Basically, it’s a chinstrap attached to a bulbous watermelon. You wear it on your head. Now, say you go into battle, and the watermelon is being worn. Say you have 100 hitpoints (just for the sake of simplicity), and you are damaged 85 hitpoints. The power of the watermelon goes ahead and heals 20% of what was just dealt to you, which would be ~17-18 hitpoints. This item can use its affects on you three times before it disintegrates, and plants a watermelon seed plot right underneath where you are standing. This plot acts as farming experience for you, and can is used the same way as you would use any other farming plot.

Read full topic
